i.span: Durée moyenne écoulée entre la date de la commission et la date de validation et e-signature des avis
Pourcentage du nombre des avis favorables rapporté au nombre total des avis émis par le membre
Nombre moyen de dossiers traités au niveau de chaque réunion commission

,{"operand":"arch.login","operator":"=","value":"query.currentUser","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.maitre_o_name","operator":"like","value":"query.allMaitresOuvrages","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.activite_desc","operator":"=","value":"query.currentActivity","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"jc.toBeDeleted","operator":"=","value":"query.jctoBeDeleted","_optional":"true","_indexType":"boolean"},{"operand":"jc.jour_commission","operator":"<=","value":"query.jour_commission.max","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"jc.jour_commission","operator":">=","value":"query.jour_commission.min","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"com.name","operator":"like","value":"query.comname","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"com.name","operator":"!=","value":"query.comindifined","_optional":"true"},{"value":" comission in (\"COMMISSION GRANDS PROJETS AIN SEBAA\") ","_asSQL":true,"_filter":true,"_filterDimension":"comission"},{"value":" mois in (\"01-2019\", \"02-2019\", \"03-2019\", \"05-2019\",
